### getLoadFPImm() {#a56787dd7342f7a3d1ba14262d29d1aab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int llvm::RISCVLoadFPImm::getLoadFPImm (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> FPImm)</>}>
getLoadFPImm - Return a 5-bit binary encoding of the floating-point immediate value.

If the value cannot be represented as a 5-bit binary encoding, then return -1.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvbaseinfo-h/#l00454">454</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvbaseinfo-h">RISCVBaseInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvbaseinfo-cpp/#l00164">164</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvbaseinfo-cpp">RISCVBaseInfo.cpp</a>.
